### Split the data with timing in the subject column
```{r}
output_dir = file.path('output_timing', paste0(category, forager_suffix))
categories = c('ANIMALS','BODY PARTS', 'FRUITS', 'HOBBIES', 'HOLIDAYS', 'HOME APPLIANCES', 'LIQUIDS', 'MEANS OF TRANSPORT', 'MEDICAL CONDITIONS', 'MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS', 'OCCUPATIONS', 'TOOLS', 'VEGETABLES')
categories = c('ANIMALS')
for (category in categories){
  
  lexical_data_timing_fn = file.path(output_dir, 'lexical_results.csv')
  lexical_data_timing_csv = read.csv(lexical_data_timing_fn, header=TRUE)
}

```
